availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Daviess County, Kentucky, cabinetmaker and postmaster. Kentucky native. Cabinetmaker in Daviess County, Kentucky, in 1850. Postmaster of Knottsville, Kentucky, from July 1853 to February 1857.

ab.bibl: Record of Appointment of Postmasters, 1832-1971, NARA Microfilm Publication, M841, Records of the Post Office Department, Record Group Number 28, Daviess County, Kentucky, p. 600-601, (accessed via Ancestry.com). Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Daviess County, District 1. Find A Grave, "Anthony H. Clements (1820-1896)," Memorial #49657356, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/49657356/anthony-h.-clements (accessed March 6, 2018).
